definitions.definition: A dire or unfortunate situation. [from 14th c.]
( now rare ) A (neutral) condition or state . [from 14th c.]

main_definition: A dire or unfortunate situation. [from 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( now rare ) A (neutral) condition or state . [from 14th c.]

definitions.definition: ( now chiefly dialectal ) Responsibility for ensuing consequences; risk ; danger ; peril .
( now chiefly dialectal ) An instance of danger or peril; a dangerous moment or situation.
( now chiefly dialectal ) Blame ; culpability ; fault ; wrong-doing ; sin ; crime .
( now chiefly dialectal ) One's office ; duty ; charge .
( archaic ) That which is exposed to risk; that which is plighted or pledged ; security ; a gage ; a pledge .

main_definition: ( now chiefly dialectal ) Responsibility for ensuing consequences; risk ; danger ; peril .
secondary_definitions: ( now chiefly dialectal ) An instance of danger or peril; a dangerous moment or situation.
( now chiefly dialectal ) Blame ; culpability ; fault ; wrong-doing ; sin ; crime .
( now chiefly dialectal ) One's office ; duty ; charge .
( archaic ) That which is exposed to risk; that which is plighted or pledged ; security ; a gage ; a pledge .

definitions.definition: A network ; a plait ; a fold ; rarely a garment .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A network ; a plait ; a fold ; rarely a garment .
